price: Sai ya yi nufin fitar da su daga ƙasar, sai Muka nutsar da shi, shi da wanda yake tãre da shi gabã ɗaya.
arabic: فَأَرَادَ أَن يَسۡتَفِزَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَأَغۡرَقۡنَٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ جَمِيعٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-arāda an yastafizzahum mina al-arḍi fa-aghraqnāhu waman maʿahu jamīʿan
